column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've always absolutely loved this place
column2: and my most recent experience even further amplified my adoration for it. They gave us free gift cards
column4: AND covered our entire meal after one of their waitresses accidentally spilled a drink on one of my friends. It was a complete and total accident
column6: but they made sure to do anything they could to mitigate discomfort on our end. I would've recommend this place to anyone prior to this incident
column7: but this just confirmed how great it is. Best customer service ever!
